remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在于集合中，返回。If the exists in the collection, it is returned. 如果中不存在集合中，为给定，执行以下操作：If the does not exist in the collection, for a given , the following actions occur: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|执行操作Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|创建指定的源列名称与源列名称与列名称。Creates a with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the column name. 这不添加到集合。This is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|如果缺少指定的列映射，则生成 。An is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|获取一个 null 值。Gets a null value.| ## Examples 下面的示例搜索具有给定的源列名称在集合中。The following example searches for a with the given source column name within the collection. 如果该对象存在，则返回它。If the object exists, it is returned. 该示例假定集合和一个对象已创建。The example assumes that a collection and a object have been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.GetColumnMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.GetColumnMappingBySchemaAction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.GetColumnMappingBySchemaAction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMappingCollection.GetColumnMappingBySchemaAction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
